After the long flight from hawaii Ragnus came to a rest about a 
hundred yards from the co-ordinates given to him by the 'Predacon'.  
Still not trusting the information so easily given, he transforms 
into his more 'combat' friendly form, his fourteen foot tall robot 
form.  This form retains the giant wings of his dragon mode, but 
that's all, instead of the sleek mechanical dragon, there is a huge 
heavily armored robot.  

Powering up the railguns located on his forearms and taking a couple 
of two foot long cylinders from below some armor plates on his hips, 
he moved in towards the base.
